text: @realDonaldTrump And how many lives will be taken due to you inept, inadequate response to the Coronavirus?  10,000? 20,000? 100,000? How many?  How can you live with yourself?  A sick, ill-prepared, full of yourself, narcissist.  Once out of the WH, watch out for the handcuffs
